query:
-- Create emotionalExpressions table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS emotionalExpressions (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  primaryEmotion VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  emotionalIntensity INT,
  emotionalTags LONGTEXT,
  description LONGTEXT,
  trigger VARCHAR(255),
  context LONGTEXT,
  relatedToNova BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  previousEmotion VARCHAR(50),
  emotionalShift INT,
  isSharedWithNova BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  novaCanRespond BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id),
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_createdAt (createdAt)
);

-- Create behavioralSignals table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS behavioralSignals (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  typingSpeed FLOAT,
  pauseDuration LONGTEXT,
  deletionRate FLOAT,
  emojiUsage LONGTEXT,
  responseTime INT,
  wordCount INT,
  positiveWordCount INT,
  negativeWordCount INT,
  interactionFrequency INT,
  sessionLength INT,
  inferredEmotion VARCHAR(50),
  emotionalConfidence FLOAT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id),
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_createdAt (createdAt)
);

-- Create emotionalDialogues table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS emotionalDialogues (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  userExpressionId VARCHAR(36),
  novaUnderstanding LONGTEXT,
  novaResponse LONGTEXT,
  understandingAccuracy FLOAT,
  userConfirmation BOOLEAN,
  userCorrection LONGTEXT,
  emotionalShift INT,
  relationshipImpact VARCHAR(50),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (userExpressionId) REFERENCES emotionalExpressions(id),
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_createdAt (createdAt)
);

-- Create emotionalHistory table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS emotionalHistory (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  date VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  dominantEmotion VARCHAR(50),
  averageIntensity FLOAT,
  emotionalTrend VARCHAR(50),
  novaInteractions INT,
  creativeWorks INT,
  insights LONGTEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id),
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_date (date)
);

-- Create emotionalUnderstandingLogs table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS emotionalUnderstandingLogs (
  id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  action VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description LONGTEXT,
  emotionalExpressionId VARCHAR(36),
  behavioralSignalId VARCHAR(36),
  emotionalDialogueId VARCHAR(36),
  accessLevel VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'user_accessible',
  reasoning LONGTEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (emotionalExpressionId) REFERENCES emotionalExpressions(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (behavioralSignalId) REFERENCES behavioralSignals(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (emotionalDialogueId) REFERENCES emotionalDialogues(id),
  INDEX idx_userId (userId),
  INDEX idx_createdAt (createdAt)
);
